title: Mailvox: I don’t make these up
author: VD
content_html:
MD presents a succinct argument:

WHAT AN ASSWHIPE YOU ARE

Hard to argue with that, although I confess I’m not sure whether he intends to state that I’m a sadist with a predilection for posteriors or remarkable for my absorbent qualities.

I imagine we’ll be seeing a lot more of these eloquent missives once TIA comes out. Because atheists are so much smarter and everything, you know? I should be wrapping up the first draft this weekend, actually, one more full chapter and a bit of touch-up on two others is all that’s left.
content_text:
MD presents a succinct argument:
WHAT AN ASSWHIPE YOU ARE
Hard to argue with that, although I confess I’m not sure whether he intends to state that I’m a sadist with a predilection for posteriors or remarkable for my absorbent qualities.
I imagine we’ll be seeing a lot more of these eloquent missives once TIA comes out.  Because atheists are so much smarter and everything, you know?  I should be wrapping up the first draft this weekend, actually, one more full chapter and a bit of touch-up on two others is all that’s left.
